I raised multiple compliants, but LG ASM said it is normal and they can't do anything about it. So, better stay away from LG refrigerator. After 4 months, there was another fault in the grill circuit and LG technician said to replace the entire grill unit. The video of the fault is attached for ref. Even after CEO escalation, there is no resolution to the problem and the refrigerator is lying idle in my house for last 6 months now. Worst experience I had with LG.

It was all over the freezer, in the ice box, in the side door. We have been complaining to whirlpool since last 4 months, all they are doing is sending technicians(5-6 so far came) and they are unable to fix it. They are not even ready to change the model. This is a kind of harassment my 80 year old grandmother facing since we bought this refrigerator to her and we regret it. Hence a heads up to other customers who plan to buy this. Please do not make this mistake. Buying appliances from.whirlpool has become a harassment

comments.title: Not Happy with the purchase and the service after sale.
comments.description: After lot of research, I found this fridge suitable for my family (Whirlpool 265 L 3 Star Inverter Frost-Free Double Door Refrigerator with Intellisense inverter technology (INTELLIFRESH INV CNV 278 3S, German Steel, Convertible). I ordered it online, received the product and demo was given to me after 2 day, which is ok. After 2 weeks, I realized the fridge is not cooling as fast as it should be, I changed the setting from Auto to high as in summers we use fridge a lot, to store food and drinks etc. In next 2 days fridge completed stopped cooling, only freezer was working. I raised the complaint on Whirlpool site on 15th May 2022 and service team called next day and visited us. He mentioned that we need to switch off the fridge at least for 2 day and then he will come and check it. Then he mentioned that he will call us before coming so that we will be ready, he did not call me next day, that week I called him twice to confirm his visit. finally, he called back on Saturday i.e., 21st of May 2022 and asked us to switch off the fridge and he will visit in the evening, finally he visited around 7.30- 8.00 pm and fixed the fridge. after repairing he started convincing me to buy the Stabilizer, initially I said no, however, he told that the problem I had with my fried is because of no stabilizer is attached, finally I bought the Stabilizer for INR 2250/-

Now after 2 days they are saying that they have ordered the compressor which is going to take 2-3 days. Spoke with customer care and they said your refrigerator can be replaced completely. comments.title: Good design, inferior materials
comments.description: ¬†Returned this in 1 day. The design is great: a nice big rollout bin for produce. But the inside plastic looks cheap and breakable. It came with 3 cracks when delivered. And the vent thing at the bottom came off and wouldn't snap back in. Open the door for a little bit and the shelves get all wet from the condensation. It stays that way for hours -- a slimy wetness. The edges of the shelves of "toughened glass" are a little bendable (not good material). I knew this product wouldn't last long so I exchanged it for a less "cool" brand and model.

comments.title: GO FOR IT
comments.description: The refrigerator works fine. Its indeed a good choice to make. The one thing I noted is - sometimes there would be water stored in the heater fitted (coil) tank. The heater is installed to make the water evaporate. Not sure why that water logging happens though. (Maybe because we have a lot of voltage fluctuation and we have no stabilizer). Still the refrigerator functions good and theres no problem at all after a month usage. The deep freeze is really strong !

comments.title: Slightly dissapointed
comments.description: The fridge has worked well for exactly 1 year and 10 days. As usual the fridge stopped working after the warranty ran out and the 10 year warranty only covers the compressor. What failed. ?  The coil. So 450rps for the callout and 3000rps for the new coil. Im 65 years old and this is the first time ive had a coil fail. Obviously not fit for purpose as it should last at least 5 years or 10 like the compressor. So yes it worked well and after repair should work again but verry annoying to have to pay out 3450rps to fix a 1 year old fridge.

comments.title: Good Refrigerator nd Having No problem.
comments.description: It's a good refrigerator in this budget. Compressor is very silent and didn't create a little bit sound. Designing nd finishing is also good. Before purchasing it i read several negative reaview about this refrigerator that water leakage from back water tray, water droplet on the deepfreezer gate, but in my case no such a problem occur, Yes in starting few water droplets began to occur on deepfreezer zone and after few day it didn't happen. And I'll told you that water droplets occur due to moisture or when we switch off the refrigerator. Before it i owned LG refrigerator so i was also hesitating to switch to Samsung brand refrigerator but after purchasing i hadn't found any type of problem in this refrigerator. Overall it's a good product by Samsung.

comments.title: Samsung refrigerator
comments.description: I have purchased this product in May 2022. But I am not satisfied with this fridge. This is the first time I have purchased any Samsung item. But I am highly disappointed. The cooling of the refrigerator is not upto the mark. Although it is spacious but the cooling part is not great. I have asked there engineer and compared it's cooling with my another Whirlpool fridge and he said that this fridge has some design issues due to which the cooling is low. Samsung has not provided the freezer as per the size of the fridge due to which cooling is not properly till the bottom. Actually Samsung should work on their design and made thorough testing before launching any product in the market.

comments.title: No Gimmicks, and I'm loving it
comments.description: Writing this review after 8 months of the purchase. Before purchase I checked offline and online, and I found a huge discounted rate if I purchase from online. But I had a doubt in my mind that if I get any damaged product by chance then it will be a big problem. So I called and raised my doubt to Customer Care of Amazon, and they confirmed that I can check and then I can accept the product, and if I found any dent or any other issue I can refuse to accept the product. So I checked every corner from top to bottom and I was lucky not to receive any damaged product. Now the product is good, really good. Although it is not super silent, but it is not loud either. Every other reviewer covers every Pros and Cons, I just want to add 1 point which is, if you are looking for a refrigerator which you can lock the door from your little monster in your home then this is not your product. But if you need a good refrigerator with a big Brand name, useful features then certainly you can trust Samsung and Amazon duo. Thank you Amazon, Samsung for this wonderful purchasing experience.

comments.title: Don't fall into the trap, this is not convertible
comments.description: Fake marketing and fake product by Samsung. I lost piece of mind after buying this refrigerator. Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.
